minions.name: Monster Tornado
minions.description: Talent: Move a minion of power 4 or less from here to another base, or from another base to here

minions.name: Cyclone
minions.description: Talent: Move this minion to another base

minions.name: Twister
minions.description: You may move a minion of power 3 or less from here to another base, or from another base to here

minions.name: Dust Devil
minions.description: Special: Before a base scores, you may move this minion to there

actions.name: Carried Away
actions.description: Move a minion to another base

actions.name: Trade Winds
actions.description: Choose two minions of power 3 or less. Move each one to the other's base

actions.name: Gone with the Wind
actions.description: Special: Play after a base scores. You may move one of your minions from there to another base instead of the discard pile

actions.name: Not in Kansas
actions.description: Destroy a base and any actions played on it or on minions there. Replace it with the top card of the base deck. All minions from the original base remain

actions.name: Over the Rainbow
actions.description: Special: Play before a base scores. Move one of your minions from another base to there

actions.name: Picked Up
actions.description: Special: Play before a base scores. Move a minion from there to another base

actions.name: Ripped Off
actions.description: Transfer an action played on a base to another base or on a minion to another minion

actions.name: Whirlwinds
actions.description: You may move any number of your minions to other bases
